Mr, Harry J. Skornia
Deshier Hilton Hotel
Broad & High Streets
Columbus, Ohio
Dear Harry
I have your letter of May 5th and I am herewith enclosing a number
of copies of the statement on the Smathers Bill,
I testified this morning and everything went very smoothly. I feel
confident that if the Bill is favorably reported, it will have a provision
in it specifically exempting educational institutions.
I presented the statement for the record, then spoke extemporaneously
for five or ten minutes. When I referred to the fact that the University
of Michigan would be involved. Senator Potter immediately became
very interested and assured me of his support for the amendment which
we proposed.
cc: Dr. Burton Paulu
Dr. Richard B. Hull
